title: Smart Data models - BWP schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the BWP Information Object Class (IOC) that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

bwpContext.description: Property. Identifies whether the object is used for downlink, uplink or supplementary uplink.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

cyclicPrefix.description: Property. Cyclic prefix, which may be normal or extended.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

isInitialBwp.description: Property. Identifies whether the object is used for initial or other BWP.. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

numberOfRBs.description: Property. Number of physical resource blocks for a BWP.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

startRB.description: Property. Offset in common resource blocks to common resource block 0 for the applicable subcarrier spacing for a BWP.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

subCarrierSpacing.description: Property. Subcarrier spacing configuration for a BWP.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'
